message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_MATCHING_CITIZEN_WORKSPACE_ACCOUNT
message.locale: A Citizen Workspace account cannot be found for the username %1s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_USER_ALREADY_LINKED
message.locale: User is already linked to the ExternalSystem

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_ASSOCIATION_EXISTS
message.locale: No associations exists for this ExternalParty ID %1s and ExternalSystem %2s combination

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_ASSOCIATION_EXISTS_USER
message.locale: User with username %1s does not have a linked citizenworkspace account.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_UNLINK
message.locale: Cannot unlink a non linked user
